evolutions.name: Scholars
evolutions.description: The students have become scholars. Their thirst for knowledge is unstoppable.

evolutions.name: Savants
evolutions.description: Now savants, they've transcended normal scholarly pursuits. Every thought is a fountain of wisdom.

evolutions.name: Coaches
evolutions.description: The trainers have evolved into coaches, guiding their students with expertise and patience.

evolutions.name: Mentors
evolutions.description: Now mentors, they've reached a pinnacle of guidance. Their wisdom shapes the future.

evolutions.name: Universities
evolutions.description: The academies have grown into universities, havens of learning and innovation.

evolutions.name: Centers of Excellence
evolutions.description: They've become Centers of Excellence, pioneering the frontier of knowledge.

evolutions.name: Grandmasters
evolutions.description: The masters have evolved into grandmasters, embodying the pinnacle of their discipline.

evolutions.name: Legends
evolutions.description: Now legends, their skills and wisdom are unparalleled in history.

evolutions.name: Pioneers
evolutions.description: The grandmasters have become pioneers, charting new territories in their fields.

evolutions.name: Visionaries
evolutions.description: Now visionaries, they are creating the future with their groundbreaking insights.

evolutions.name: dGenPrime
evolutions.description: The divine generator has evolved into dGenPrime, producing even greater divine energy.

evolutions.name: dGenUltra
evolutions.description: Now dGenUltra, it emanates an astounding amount of divine power.

evolutions.name: dGen2Advanced
evolutions.description: dGen2 has evolved into dGen2Advanced, multiplying its divine power generation.

evolutions.name: dGen2Superior
evolutions.description: Now dGen2Superior, it's an epitome of divine energy generation.

evolutions.name: dGen3Pro
evolutions.description: dGen3 has become dGen3Pro, radiating divine power more effectively.

evolutions.name: dGen3Ultra
evolutions.description: Now dGen3Ultra, it's the ultimate divine generator.

evolutions.name: dGen4Max
evolutions.description: dGen4 has evolved into dGen4Max, reaching a new level of divine power generation.

evolutions.name: dGen4Supreme
evolutions.description: Now dGen4Supreme, it's the apex of divine energy creation.

evolutions.name: dGen5Ultimate
evolutions.description: dGen5 has become dGen5Ultimate, epitomizing divine energy production.

evolutions.name: dGen5Omega
evolutions.description: Now dGen5Omega, it's the final word in divine generator evolution.
